snippet: The United States will resume some military sales to Bahrain despite human rights concerns after more than a year of protests against kingdom’s rulers, the State Department said Friday.
abstract: United States will resume some military sales to Bahrain despite human rights concerns after more than a year of protests against kingdom’s rulers.
lead_paragraph: The United States will resume some military sales to Bahrain despite human rights concerns after more than a year of protests against kingdom’s rulers, the State Department said Friday.

headline.main: Bahrain: U.S. Arms Sales to Resume
